column1: IN THE COURT OF APPEAL OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST
In  the  matter  of  an  appeal  under  and  in  terms
of S.34(1) of the Right to Information Act No. 12
of  2016  read  with  Court  of  Appeal  (Appellate
Procedure)  Rules  1990  of  the  Constitution  of
the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
